## AlRoute.evaluateCondition() method

Evaluates an AlRouteCondition recursively.

Internally, the methods compiles boolean results of a) nested conditions b) route parameters or parameter expressions c) path matches d) entitlements or other externally calculated conditions And then uses a simple reducer to roll up all results based on the condition rule, which defaults to 'all'.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
evaluateCondition(condition: AlRouteCondition | boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  condition | <code>AlRouteCondition &#124; boolean</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
